name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon Free Shipping to Israel-Search Filter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Limit your Amazon search to only products that ship free to Israel with the touch of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now with just the click of a button you can limit your Amazon search results to only show those that ship to Israel free. Pin this extension in Chrome and then you just have to hit the button once per search, no need to copy and paste any text into the address.
